summary: Charlie is an average French suburban teenager, but when she becomes fast friends with Sarah, the rebellious new girl at school, she discovers there's nothing average about how she feels.
cast: Joséphine Japy|Lou de Laâge|Isabelle Carré|Claire Keim|Radivoje Bukvic|Roxane Duran|Thomas Solivérès|Camille Claris|Louka Meliava|Louise Grinberg|Fanny Sidney|Anne Marivin|Marie Denarnaud|Carole Franck|Alejandro Albarracín|Vinciane Millereau|Victor Assié|Morgan Perez|Stéphane Biguet|Muriel Rosello|Julien Masdoua|Caroline Laplace-Jourdain|Nicolas Peytavi|Marc Chouarain|Tiffany Thoyer-Rozat|Baptiste Guillaume
keywords: betrayal by a friend|friendship|smothered with pillow|smothered with a pillow|murder
title: Respira
